title: Between You And Us: Episode 6
description:
We've intercepted Bob Schieffer's emails to bring you this very important episode. He'd probably give this podcast 0 bombs if he could.  But we hope the rest of you enjoy another exploration of awful reviews and the people who write them, but ones our lovely listeners sent us!

If you'd like to submit a funny review, email us at beachtoosandy@gmail.com with "Between You And Us" in the subject line.

Buy our merch! https://store.dftba.com/collections/beach-too-sandy-water-too-wet

Logo by Courtney DeKorte. Theme by Mavus White.

Music by PSOVOD and tyops.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
